pages.text: Every now and then you are lucky enough to have an enemy leave behind a single rare item.$(br)The connection of $(l:resources/clover)Clovers$(/l) and $(l:general/pigment#light_blue)Light Blue Pigment$(/l) to luck you can increase those chances dramatically.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Higher chance to get rare loot drops, like $(item)Iron Ingots$() from Zombies.$(br)$(italic)May even increase your chances of getting the most valuable of drops?$()$(br2)Max Level: 3$(br)Applicable to melee weapons.$(br)Mutually exclusive with Looting.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a $(item)common Book$() with Clovers' Favor by surrounding your $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$() with $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading Clovers' Favor from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.$(br)This price will quickly increase to more and more $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and experience for each additional level.
